name: Bean Moving
description:
You are Beanja, a ninja bean that finds out there is a global corporation imprisoning other beans inside cans of soup, and selling them for profit. Realizing this is the cause of his family's disappearance, he decides to go into one of the cans and save them one by one, facing many corrupted beans along the way, and also a much greater threat.

Listen to the OST by 'The Beantles' on YouTube: https://youtu.be/zp1pCC0kHzY

This game was made for Paint Jam 2021.

Challenge:
All art made on Paint with a mouse.

Iago Grah - Programming, Art

Douglas Henrique - Music, Sound Design

Caio Fabeni - Creative Consulting
